description.narrative: Disaster Response and Recovery Facility (DRRF) programme aims to enhance disaster response and recovery functions to address natural disasters and humanitarian crisis, including Rohingya influx in Coxs Bazar.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: SGBV
Country has an enabling environment in place leveraging additional resources from public and private sources for the SDGs: Institutional mechanisms
Country has data-informed development and investment plans that incorporate integrated solutions to reduce disaster risks and enable climate change adaptation and mitigation
Country has improved capacities for dialogue, consensus-building and reconciliation around contested issues, with equal participation of women and men
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Economic shocks
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Natural hazards
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Other risk factors
Country has strengthened capacities for governance and oversight of rule of law institutions
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Human rights
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Rule of law and justice
Country has sub-national mechanisms for mitigating risks to urban centres
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Development plans and strategies
Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, to establish or strengthen national infrastructures for peace
Number of Electoral Management Bodies (EMBs) with strengthened capacity to conduct inclusive, effective and accountable elections
Number of constitution-making bodies (CMBs) with mechanisms for civic engagement, including the participation of women and marginalized groups
Number of micro, small and medium-sized enterprises utilizing supplier development platforms for inclusive and sustainable value chains
Number of national and sub-national governments and other partners sharing their innovative solutions from the Global South National government
Number of national and sub-national governments and other partners sharing their innovative solutions from the Global South Other partners
